dsa.iface

Interface ITree<T>

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IBinarySearchTree<T>, IBinaryTree<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractBinaryTree, AVLTree, BinarySearchTree, ProperLinkedBinaryTree, SplayTree

    public interface ITree<T>
    Interface representing a Tree data structure.
    Author:
    daithi

        T replace(IPosition<T> p,
          T e)
        Replace the element contained in a position.
        Parameters:
        p - A position in the tree.

        Returns:
